idlastro/

db_titles.pro


top source db_titles

db_titles, fnames, titles

NAME: DB_TITLES

PURPOSE: Print database name and title. Called by DBHELP

CALLING SEQUENCE: db_titles, fnames, titles

INPUT: fnames - string array of data base names

SIDE EFFECT: Database name is printed along with the description in the .dbh file

HISTORY: version 2 W. Landsman May, 1989 modified to work under Unix, D. Neill, ACC, Feb 1991. William Thompson, GSFC/CDS (ARC), 1 June 1994 Added support for external (IEEE) representation. William Thompson, GSFC, 3 November 1994 Modified to allow ZDBASE to be a path string. Converted to IDL V5.0 W. Landsman September 1997 Assume since V5.5, W. Landsman September 2006

Parameters

fnames
titles
